overallGoal:
## Overview  
This 7-day study plan is designed to help you master the fundamental concepts of convection heat and mass transfer, including boundary layer theory, dimensional analysis, and practical applications. Each day includes 2.0 hours of focused study, ensuring comprehensive coverage of the material.
